data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 6,780 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kathua, Jammu and Kashmir, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Kathua, Jammu and Kashmir, India so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Kathua.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Kathua that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Seok people. Make the Seok people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, fill the 616,400 souls living in the county of Kathua with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Kathua, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Kathua, Jammu and Kashmir, India has a population of 616,400.

We estimate Kathua has 6,780 people who might know Jesus, 7,479 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 602,141 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God, guide the 6,780 believers in Kathua to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.

location.name: Kathua
location.people_groups_list: Lama, Kavoj, Saryara (Hindu traditions), Bedar, Gaddi (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Lama (600), Kavoj (400), Saryara (Hindu traditions) (16,000), Bedar (10,000), Gaddi (Muslim traditions) (431,000)
